channel.title: puppeteer on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in puppeteer on Mark Needham

item.title: Puppeteer: Unsupported command-line flag: --enabled-blink-features=IdleDetection.
item.description: In many of the StarTree recipe videos that I’ve worked on, I show how to write queries in the Pinot UI. If I wrote these queries manually there’d be way too many typos, so I drive the UI using a script. I’ve recently been exploring whether I can do this using a Node.js library called Puppeteer and wanted to share a warning message that I ran into early doors.
